LaunchLocation.name: Luna Base
LaunchLocation.description: A launchpad situated in a southern crater at Luna, no need to worry about getting to orbit through a thick atmosphere.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Launch Pad
LaunchLocation.description: An advanced elevated launchpad with a grid to deflect the rocket exhausts to the sea, perfectly placed at the equator for the most efficient equatorial orbits.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Large Pad
LaunchLocation.description: A large pad of concrete with a lot of clearance all around it, allowing for the largest crafts and spaceships imaginable to launch.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Westward Runway
LaunchLocation.description: A large runway with close access to the hangars of the DSC, pointing East-West while being almost exactly at the equator of Droo.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Eastward Runway
LaunchLocation.description: A large runway that requires some taxi-ing, pointing West-East while being almost exactly at the equator of Droo.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Secondary Runway
LaunchLocation.description: A mid sized runway located on the DSC ending on a sea cliff, allowing for a last chance to pitch up in the case of an emergency.

LaunchLocation.name: Ali Pad
LaunchLocation.description: A secret rocket launch facility surrounded by mountains meant to do potentially explosive tests without harming any equipment.

LaunchLocation.name: Ali 10L
LaunchLocation.description: A mid sized runway situated in a secret military base in a salt lake surrounded by tall mountains.

LaunchLocation.name: Ali 28R
LaunchLocation.description: A mid sized runway situated in a secret military base in a salt lake surrounded by tall mountains.

LaunchLocation.name: Juno Village Pad
LaunchLocation.description: A small pad far from the village to launch and blow things up without minding the neighbors.

LaunchLocation.name: Juno Village Runway
LaunchLocation.description: A small and complicated runway situated in the edge of a mountain, with a ramp to make up for its short length.

LaunchLocation.name: DSC Bay
LaunchLocation.description: A spot in the water, in front of the DSC port. The ideal place to launch boats and floatplanes already from the water. Unlocking it lowers the recovery fees for crafts in the water.
